website_summaries.verdict: The official Microsoft controller is also the most reliable.
pros: This Bluetooth wireless controller comes in a gigantic range of colors and easily meets the needs any Xbox One owner
Incredibly easy to connect to your PC
Though it's more expensive than most third party models, you are paying for a quality device
cons: Some color options may be far more expensive than others

customer_reviews.title: Broke within a couple of months, never dropped it, light usage.
customer_reviews.text: Great for a month and a half of use, now the right analog always goes up without me touching it. For instance, when playing a shooter my character will begin aiming upwards and never stops. It happens at random and it’s happening more and more as time goes on. Also, when I try to go up once on a menu or something, the controller reads it as 2-3 times and will jump upwards 2-3 times. Same with the bumpers.
customer_reviews.author: Peyton Land

customer_reviews.title: Good-looking and sturdy controller.
customer_reviews.text: I was in need for a new Xbox one controller as I was still using the controller I got from my original Xbox one back in 2014. The right bumper was the reason I purchased this controller (I blame assassins creed origins for their terrible idea to make RB the attack button) and it was definitely worth it. The design feels a lot more sturdy and the look is sleek. Hopefully it can hold up, but for now it's working great. And that new RB button? Works great. I really am enjoying this controller.
customer_reviews.author: sean hughes

customer_reviews.title: DON’T BUY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The only reason why I bought this controller was for my son to use the headset, less than a year and it stopped working! 90 days of warranty is a joke, considering the price... Microsoft should offer and exchange program for their crappy products. Very disappointing that they don’t offer any solution on their website but to purchase a new one! Also, in order to find a solution or if it was under warranty I had to register my email address which was very annoying, specially when I got not solution to the problem.
customer_reviews.author: jackie

customer_reviews.title: Headphones are a little quiet on this model and not as sensitive as my original  white controller.
customer_reviews.text: Update.... my original controller's thumb pad wore off so I started using this controller. It is more sluggish and less sensitive than my white original. I felt like i had forgotten how to play rocket league. I switched back to my white controller and eveything was fine. ........Original post, It works great like the one that came with my system. Well made, great colors. Only thing I noticed is that my headphones are not as loud with this controller as with my original controller. Whether or not it is a one off problem or an across the board problem with this model I don't know. If the headphone problem is not an issue this is a great contriller.
customer_reviews.author: David Borchert

customer_reviews.title: Let it be known, the greatest achievement of Xbox platform, the Xbox controller.
customer_reviews.text: One of best controller in the market. Ain't cheap but worth it for frequent gamer, since alternative cost much more with fraction of improvement. I primarily use it for my pc gaming. It works well with an adapter. Bluetooth is unreliable and will cause frustration and headaches. My gaming experience won't be same without it. It feels superior compared to other controllers. Doesn't fare well against drop compared to Xbox 360 controller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice color scheme
customer_reviews.text: Nice color scheme variation of the standard wireless controller. Got this for PC gaming, does the trick, bluetooth works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Andy B.

customer_reviews.title: This flashy plastic piece of junk... so scuff.
customer_reviews.text: Left bumper started missing here and there the second day. By fourth day it was barely registering. Unfortunately my return is no longer available, so I'm stuck with a scuffed controller. I play a lot of FPS on bumper jumper. Anyone who uses bumper jumper knows what a pain in the arse this is, not being able to use your jump. Anyone in Destiny will know that this doesn't bode well for Warlock jumps... like, at all!! Buy one from a local place or something worth the money. Don't look for a cheap controller with flashy colors, it doesn't work. Literally.
customer_reviews.author: BUMPIN DUMPLINS

customer_reviews.title: This is a definite upgrade from an already excellent controller.
customer_reviews.text: This newer version of the Xbox One controller is a great upgrade from the original XB1 controller. They've added a tactile grip which makes it feel more secure in your hands, and it also seems more sturdy and well-made. Also, the on/off button on the original controller was so bright it was distracting if you were playing a game with the lights low or turned off in your room. They've addressed that issue by making the light much more dim. This is a definite upgrade from an already excellent controller.
customer_reviews.author: PRIMUS

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase this item
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased in June but not used until this month. The headphones (multiple pairs tried) don't work for the chat. The volume is way too low to hear. Unfortunately the return policy is 30days from delivery. I will never purchase from this seller (GamePartyUS ) new or a used/refurbished item ever again. (edit) For the record when initially purchased I recall it was a new item. Now looking back on the order details it says used/like new. Also this is one of multiple xbox one wireless controllers I've purchased. There are other problems with the LB buttons sticking etc. We're waiting for the new model to come out before purchasing any more controllers.
customer_reviews.author: Banana_Royalle

customer_reviews.title: Gold standard pad.
customer_reviews.text: The Xbox One controllers are truly the best general purpose pads. They're extremely comfortable, the buttons and triggers feel fantastic, battery life is great and Bluetooth is a nice touch. It's an upgrade in every single way from a 360 controller, and that controller was already fantastic. The only downside to the controller is Bluetooth can be a little finicky on PC. If you don't like messing with things I'd suggest an Xbox wireless adapter. 4 stars because of Bluetooth and driver issues on PC. If the driver gets fixed I'll update to 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Juliett Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for a few months
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a spare controller when my wife wants to play a few games of Halo with me. Worked fine for a few months of mild use. I noticed that the sound through my headphones would cut in and out and then all of a sudden it went completely mute. I tried a different set of headphones, same result. I then used the factory controller that came with the Xbox, and the sound is fine. I suspect the headphone jack port is loose and not working correctly. I also suspect that these controllers are refurbished and not OEM Microsoft products. I will purchase my next controller from a certified reseller next time
customer_reviews.author: Coty Walters

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: I received this controller on December 6th and now, on feburary 7th the left analog stick is now drifting up and down... I wasn’t going to complain about the issue I had on day 1 because it was sort of miner... but the Xbox button in the middle has always been dysfunctional. You have to press it in harder than you would a normal controller for it to work.. Do not buy this controller. I’ve had a terrible experience for a more expensive controller
customer_reviews.author: Lori Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 1.5 months
customer_reviews.text: Broke after 1.5 months of use, left analog stick will malfunction causing the input to go up. Honestly from the beginning the outer shell seemed to have poor fit and finish, with small gaps and movement. Especially when compared to the original one I have that came with the original Xbox. This one seemed to be lower quality, perhaps this is a counterfeit? Or maybe I’m unlucky and received a defected unit?
customer_reviews.author: Ljm

customer_reviews.title: good until its not.
customer_reviews.text: For three months the controller I bought worked great. It felt great in my hands and everything worked smoothly. These past couple of weeks have been disheartening. The sound began to go on and off randomly. I tried plugging different headphones into the 3.5mm jack, playing a different game, and using the headphones while watching movies but, the sound would still cut out at random. Fast forward two weeks and now the left joystick has come unseated. the joystick just flops around in circles. I have never thrown the controller so, I can only guess at why parts of it are already breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Don't recommend this controller
customer_reviews.text: Left joystick on first controller constantly tracks to the right so I returned it and ordered another one, but it has the same problem. Also, on the second remote that I ordered, after about 2 months of use the left bumper got wedged under the exterior plastic. Do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kirstyn Freeman

customer_reviews.title: No Li-ion Battery Pack Included, so Higher Price Not a Good Deal
customer_reviews.text: The controller is essentially the same as the original Microsoft Xbox One controllers, just in a different color. Nice if you like the gray/green color scheme. However, the Product Description states, "Batteries: 1 Lithium ion batteries required. (included)." This is not true -it comes with a set of foreign sourced standard Alakline AA batteries. Reason for the lower rating. The controller is already about $5 more than the regular Microsoft black or white controllers, so without the Microsoft Li-ion rechargable battery pack, which will run you another $20 plus, it's not a good buy. If you have a rechargable battery pack in another Microsoft Xbox One controller, it will work with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Porkchop61YD

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Module, Drifting issues
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this or any microsoft controller till they fix there modules that drift. We have 4 xbox one microsoft controllers and they all drift on the screen after a few months of work and if you look online this is a common issue. They should warranty this issue for atleast 3-6 months. very dissapointed... Don't waist your money...
customer_reviews.author: dj33

customer_reviews.title: It's an Xbox Controller
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking up reviews for this controller, I'm not sure what you expect. If you bought a newer version of the Xbox One, it's the standard controller that came with it, except its grey with hints of green. If you dont like grey or green, then don't buy this. If don't have a controller for some reason, then buy this. You will need it play with the Xbox.
customer_reviews.author: woofy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome feel but it drifts just ever so slightly
customer_reviews.text: Love the feel of this controller! It has a grip texture which feels nice in the hands, the sticks and buttons have a good pressure and feed back to them. It feels really durable and comfy in my hands too. The issue however is that right away I noticed the tiniest drift in the left stick (the walking movement stick for most games) This doesn't present a problems in most cases except for games where you might need to stand still for a while like in shooters when your are sniping or camping. Plenty of other examples too. I'd buy this again though because I'm sure its just a weird one in a 1000 defect and its really small.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: Xbox Wireless Controller - Grey/Green by Microsoft
customer_reviews.text: Bought this last December for my son. He really loved it! The only problem is it's poorly made and is already broken, and not because my son abused it. We stopped using it in May 2019, and in less than six months, the left stick broke internally. A 90 day warranty, and there is no way to repair or see if it can be repaired without breaking the plastic, or spending another $50.00+ bucks. What a waste of my hard earned cash out the window... You would think they would make products like this a little tougher, especially for kids and young adults, so they can't break so readily, and landfills don't get filled with so much plastic...
customer_reviews.author: The Scrutinizer

customer_reviews.title: Refurb? Idk? Random disconnects.
customer_reviews.text: At first this controller was fine, but after a couple of weeks it began disconnecting randomly. Mainly in stressful online situations where multiple button smashing was necessary. Idk what the deal is but I will only be purchasing new controllers from local retailers from now on.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Best controller for PC
customer_reviews.text: only giving it a 4 for a personal manufacturing issue (vibration motor rattles, i know this isnt a common issue, but its not bad enough for me to deal with exchanging). i use it exclusively for PC gaming because im a scrub. plug and play is wonderful, bluetooth gave me a bit of an issue on initial setup but after restarting my PC its been solid ever since.
customer_reviews.author: John Harrington

customer_reviews.title: Constantly disconnects!!  Frustrating!
customer_reviews.text: As a Seahawks fan, this was the perfect remote for my son for a Christmas gift! The first couple of days it worked great! Unfortunately, it started disconnecting during gameplay without warning. It wouldn’t turn back on until batteries were removed and reinstalled. Sometimes it would stay connected for 30 seconds, other times 5 minutes. Batteries were full. Hard reset and restarts were made. Firmware was updated. But still would randomly disconnect. Exchanged for a new one, hoping this was just a lemon.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: I got a dud.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think it’s all these controllers but the particular one I got in the mail, I think it was a dud, it turned on and I was using it great for rainbow, apex etc.. but in the middle of games it would just disconnect from my Xbox. Not die, but i would have to get up and press the button with the two arrows to reconnect it.
customer_reviews.author: G.M. JONES Enterprises

customer_reviews.title: Battery life 33 hours!? No...
customer_reviews.text: More like 3 hours of play time at the most. Its advertised at 33 hours and all these people are rating it so high and are claiming to get 3 hours also? Am I taking crazy pills. Ok so the dock is really nice though and the lights on the front are nice and it all fits and clicks in nicely so design-wise A+... charge time from what is advertised F. Ive had a couple of these docks and have switched around and this is the easiest to charge unlike some of the other brands which has an open back and you have to wiggle the controller around to get it to charge. This one is seamless.
customer_reviews.author: PARZ1V3L

customer_reviews.title: Good but needs USB receiver
customer_reviews.text: Works great however Bluetooth is too inconsistent and I would lose connect in games at the worst times. I think it may just be a limit of Bluetooth itself because the connection to my BT speakers and headphones are also not 100% consistent either. That goes for both my TV or PC which has BT 5.0. To get this product to work with your PC you really need their USB receiver which is unfortunate. I knocked one star off because I found their claim of being able to use this with Bluetooth alone is false or at least it was for the controller I received.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Truffle

customer_reviews.title: UPDATED REVIEW: DEFECTIVE WITHIN 2 MONTHS!!! As good, if not better than the original.
customer_reviews.text: For 8 weeks this was a nice controller ... (Original: Very nice controller for the price. Tight and responsive. And, the color is sweet.) But now it is literally freaking out. The movement sticks have a mind of their own, sticking one moment, over-steering the next, not letting me select items. What a waste of $. This is very tough to play any games with and I now need to order another controller. I'm a light gamer. This is ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: btip

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: The green is cool but doesnt pop like I had hoped it would. The controller does feel nice in the hand. Grips well and doesnt slide out or feel weird after too much use. Ours came with a broken right joy stick. It slowly points down in games so shooting games dont really run so well. Maybe it was an issue with packaging. I'm sure they dont all have this problem. Anyway, it's nice but it's our backup.
customer_reviews.author: TMH21

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t Last Long
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this controller as my old one was a few years old and the analog sticks were stuck and constantly pulling me to the left. I got this new one and within 2-3 weeks I began to notice a lot of problems. The right trigger kept sticking and wouldn’t pop back out, the A button would work about half the time on the first try, and the rubberish material on the analog stick started coming apart. Honestly I think I got sent a refurbished controller.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Lunsford

customer_reviews.title: Best Value for Xbox One Wireless Controller
customer_reviews.text: Just got the controller yesterday but I put in about three hours last night and I love it so far. It's nice upgrading to these new controllers that have the direct jack for my headphones rather than having to use the adapter - it's made the sound and the mic much better.
customer_reviews.author: Jace Evans

customer_reviews.title: Defective "view" button on a new controller
customer_reviews.text: Product came in perfectly fine and safe. Worked amazing from first glance, until further gameplay, the "view" button, doesn't work. I thought maybe it was syncing issues or maybe I needed to do some methods to fix this little problem; turns out, the button is just defective and does NOT work. So much for purchasing a brand new controller. I'm sure they are not all like this, and sure it's only one button, but for some games that can be a huge difference.
customer_reviews.author: Bullethammer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: Such a high quality controller. I am never sure of what I am going to receive in terms of item condition when I buy from the Amazon Warehouse Deals seller, but this one is basically new. Like brand new in box with zero marks whatsoever. It feels amazing, from the joysticks, to the buttons, to the grips on the back of the controller. All like it was just looked at and returned for some odd reason. Very sturdy and well-built. Cant beat it for the price, and it sure as hell beats buying from a brick and mortar store for $60. Check out Amazon Warehouse Deals!!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Sorkin

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars for the unit 1 star if you think it will work with Oculus Go
customer_reviews.text: I am sure this unit is 5 stars if you use it for its intended purpose. I didn't return the unit because it was my error, I gave it to my grandson who has an Xbox. The Xbox controller is the best controller according to YouTube, I researched it, and I have the Oculus Go. The Three X range it doesn't control anything but the choice of weapons, The Driving program is way to sensitive in all not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: pabrogen

customer_reviews.title: ... know if this controller was defective or it's all like this but the range on this one was only ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if this controller was defective or it's all like this but the range on this one was only about 7 or 8 feet. I returned it
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: From other reviews, it was hit or miss...I missed.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking controller, and it has bluetooth so I can use it to play xbox on my phone. I'm only giving 2 stars because, like other reviews have stated, it shuts off for no reason. Sometimes it will do it ALOT, others it only does it once or twice, but regardless, it's very annoying. I tried updating the firmware to no avail, so I was going to send it back, but I decided to just deal with it... I should of just sent it back though.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality control
customer_reviews.text: Less than 90 days old and every other day this controller refuses to communicate with my xbox. Not sure if it's the receiver or transmitter. If it connects, it's fine for the session - but it only connects half the time. Re-linking the controller has no effect. This isn't the seller's fault - just consistently terrible quality control by the manufacturer for xbox one controllers. The 360 controllers at least lasted a year or more before they began to have issues. I've owned 4 xbox one controllers and three out of four were unusable within 6 months. This one lasted half that.
customer_reviews.author: Careful Consumer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible controller. Sellers should be ashamed they even shipped mine to me. My B button and joystick came damaged. The left stick is always moving my character to the right. The b button sticks, on top of that my RB button has to be pressed really hard to work, so does my middle button for the xbox home menu and my d pad sounds like a spring being flicked every time I use it. I dont play xbox enough for my controller to deteriorate this fast. Ridiculous. It would be okay if theyd send me a new controller to make it right but I bet they're reading this and don't care. Im never buying anything from this seller ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Noah

customer_reviews.title: A fairly decent controller
customer_reviews.text: This controller is probably some of the best controller there is too offer. I mean it feels nice to hold in ones own hands, it's fairly responsive and furthermore is easy to connect to either the xbox console or your computer.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Good color scheme and functionality. Slightly off on corner piece.
customer_reviews.text: Corner of controller is off ever so slightly and sometimes my thumb gets caught on it. Bit annoying but not a deal breaker. Likely just a one off. Other than that it works perfectly. I like the color scheme.
customer_reviews.author: John R.

customer_reviews.title: Buggy one-off controller. Stay away.
customer_reviews.text: Good looking controller. It has some gremlins in it though. Strange disconnections from three xbox in the middle of the game, failed button pushes. I'm not sure if this is a one of but I've not had problems with any of my other 4 Xbone controllers. Issues not serious enough to not be my main controller. Update: headphone port stopped working in under six months of moderate use. I do not use headphones most of the time and it's strange that it stopped functioning so quickly. I have multiple older controllers that have had other issues, but the headphone port still works. This controller definitely has some issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey Finklestein

customer_reviews.title: BROKE after less than 3 months of light use
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to rate this a 5 star review but shortly after I hit the no return mark on Amazon... this controller just stopped working for me. No matter what we tried it just wouldn't work anymore. I was forced to go spend another $50 on another Xbox one controller. Very disappointed. I could see if we did something to warrant it to stop working such as a drop or something spied on it. But nothing like that occurred and nothing we did warranted it to just stop working.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Controller.
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected. I waited to write the review until I really got use out of it. First in my opinion there quality approved. Perfect for gamers. Better than others I've bought. Great signal. I ordered 4 more. A must have for your system. Great value for the money. Would order again. Fast shipping and they work amazing. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: dawn shippy

customer_reviews.title: WHY THE JOYSTICK DRIFT?
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product for less than a year and I now have both joysticks drifting in different directions. I'm giving it two stars because it worked fine until now, but for the amount paid these controllers should be lasting for the life of the system. This is a ripoff and as disappointing as the Xbox One has been, what with them completely abandoning their player base and offering no reason to get an Xbox, I wish I had gotten the PS4.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin P. "Enthusiast"

customer_reviews.title: Windows pc
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my pc to use with steam/general gaming and it works great, windows come prepackaged with the controller drivers and they work well without any setup. You need Bluetooth capability to use this with your PC so a onboard card or dongle is required but totally worth it. Battery life is surprisingly long if you use good double AA's and the controller build is good no loose or sticky buttons,
customer_reviews.author: Wokrider

customer_reviews.title: Honestly the Best Controller Ever Made
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome controllers and have a great feel in your hand. Now that they have bluetooth, you can pair them with iOS and Android devices, and computers (without a separate dongle).
customer_reviews.author: Clay

customer_reviews.title: Good buy with a minor flaw
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my hubby since we play together now. He was thrilled for about 3 weeks. The controller worked flawlessly until one day he tried connecting his headset to the controller. It pulled right in but got nothing. After doing several tests, we determined that it was indeed the headset jack. I don’t know what caused this issue but we have not found anything to fix this. We don’t feel that this is a seller issue but a manufacturing fault.
customer_reviews.author: Daniboyyy

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Buttons
customer_reviews.text: Came on time looked amazing but there was a fault with the left joystick for some reason it would register that it was stuck in either an up or down position. This problem really confused me because the controller looks and even has a new feel to it. There’s really no other problems with my controller no damages nothing just this 1 really annoying fault. It’s honestly just so annoying because I’d set my controller down it’d be fine and then 30 seconds later it’s scrolling through whatever list because it’s registering that it’s being held up or down... I won’t update this review until my problem has been resolved!
customer_reviews.author: James Collins III

customer_reviews.title: Remote joystick and button not responding.
customer_reviews.text: No warranty with this remote. Started having occasional problems here and there about 3 months after purchase. Then over the months it has increased and now do not work. Go buy it from a reputable seller or department store that stands behind their products for warranties under a year. My last controller, I had for 5 years. Sooooo......
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Louann Odom

customer_reviews.title: It's an Xbox One S controller.
customer_reviews.text: An intuitive, well crafted controller as an Xbox controller should be. This appears to be a newer version of the XB1 S controller, as it feels just slightly different from the one that came with my console, mostly in that from what I can tell, the D pad feels like it has less less distance to travel to register inputs. I bought this to use with my PC, and it works flawlessly with a third party bluetooth dongle, never had any issues with it connecting or disconnecting.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Thumbstick Drift out of the box?
customer_reviews.text: Xbox One controllers are notorious for "Thumbstick drift" which is when the analog sticks will have inputs in random directions causing movement without moving the analog stick. This is my 4th controller (All 3 previous also having this issue) and this one already had thumbtack drift issues directly out of the box. Save yourself and buy the first edition elite controller, maybe those are built better.
customer_reviews.author: Aidan Moore

customer_reviews.title: They all drift within a year
customer_reviews.text: Didnt last long at all before controller drift kicked in. Never dropped it or slammed it or anyhing to cause this. I'm on my 4th controller. All with drift.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: I JUST WANT TO PLAY MY GAMES
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS THE 3RD CONTROLLER IV BOUGHT AND ALL 3 HAVE SLOWLY STOP WORKING. FOR EXAMPLE, IT WOULD NOT TRIGGER SOME BUTTONS WHEN I CLICKED THEM AND IT WOULD RANDOMLY CLICK FOR NO REASON CAN YOU MAKE SOMETHING THAT WONT BREAK IN A MONTH!!!
customer_reviews.author: christopher

customer_reviews.title: I like the color scheme
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be more premium feeling than the original but it's the same with paint on it
customer_reviews.author: Alex Montgomery-Buchino

customer_reviews.title: Received a Previously Owned Product!
customer_reviews.text: The controller appears to work okay, but it was very clearly a previously owned and returned controller. The manufacturer seal was broken, and the package was taped back up and had some black marker markings on it as well. The controller was loose in the package as well and not in a plastic bag as a new controller would be. I guess it’s fine as long as the controller works, but especially during a global pandemic it seems like the product description should have specified that this would be a used product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing controller
customer_reviews.text: Bought this controller to customize it into my own but I must say it is really beautiful how it comes. It’s soft and smooth and great quality. Headset jack and all the buttons work great before and after customizing it. I recommend this to everyone whether they wish to customize it or not. It’s perfect
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: The controller was fine for a couple of months (of minimal use) but now the right thumb stick moves by itself. Not worth the money. Buy a real one from Microsoft.
customer_reviews.author: Brionne

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, sturdy, like new, and a great addition to my gaming arsenal!
customer_reviews.text: Really great value for a pretty much brand stinkin new product. You can't beat the quality or the prize- and I've been using this for months and absolutely no issues. Plus it looks fantastic so I'm definitely considering getting another. Definitely can't recommend highly enough- buy one (or two)! You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: DesertReal

customer_reviews.title: Did not receive item fully functional. Seller's description was not accurate.
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to get the controller since I'm now, like a lot of other people, playing my xbox more often. But when I tried to connect my headset there was something stuck in it. Now, with a pair of tweezers I was able to take it out, but the bad review comes from the miscommunication and bad ethics of advertising this product as a fully functional controller when there were clearly issues with it. It's a used controller and I'm not expecting it to be perfect, but the seller keeping information like this to itself is just disrespectful and unethical.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Good control, false advertised gift
customer_reviews.text: This is my third xbox one control, I like them all (much better than the PS ones). What dissapoints me is the wrong or false bonus of 3 months of Xbox Live Gold membership. My came with a 15 days only code! This is NOT the reason i boughth the control, but 3 months would be a much nicer bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio K.

customer_reviews.title: looks great feels great but...
customer_reviews.text: NOTE: Got mine through Amazon warehouse deals I'm sure not all units have the same dysfunction that mine did. The wireless connectivity would intermittently cut off, mid game, mid movie or whenever. I have only had the controller for a week and i'm returning it. Most item from Amazon ware house aren't bad, but this time... my luck just ran out. Time to return and get a new one
customer_reviews.author: Christoph

customer_reviews.title: Works terribly with Windows 10...
customer_reviews.text: I've only had the controller for maybe a week and from day 1 I've experienced connectivity issues. This is with the controller being less than 3 feet from the computer. I've tried new batteries, removing the device from Windows as well reinstalling drivers... The controller may work for a few minutes after doing the aforementioned, but eventually starts to act up. Buttons either stop registering altogether or has a mind of its own and will send commands to the machine without me even touching the controller.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher A. Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Great look and feel, functionality is off
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and feel of this controller, it's not the super smooth feel that a lot of them have which makes it great for extended gaming sessions. One thing I am having issues with is the responsiveness of it. It doesn't always turn on immediately when I press the button, it can take a few tries & the right stick and X and B buttons don't always work which kind of ruins a lot of games for me since those are essential functions to every game I play. I've also found it very difficult to try to get a hold of Microsoft for a replacement as I'm sure I just got a lemon.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Can't use rechargeable batteries
customer_reviews.text: The controller works poorly with rechargeable batteries. the controller will shut off at random points in the game and then will not turn back on afterwards. i tried the batteries in any controller that i have and they work perfectly fine with no issues. there will be times that the controller will not turn back on for minutes or a hard reboot of the xbox might do the trick. I place normal batteries in the remote and the controller works perfectly fine.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Araujo

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for 4 months .....then drift
customer_reviews.text: Right joystick drifts. Controller has never been dropped and is clean. It is a controller I hide away from my kids and their friends so I would always have a working controller. Didn't work out as planned.
customer_reviews.author: lanmanusa

customer_reviews.title: Great design. True official quality.
customer_reviews.text: Any regular gamer knows that it can be tempting to go to 3rd parties for unique controllers seeing as how official ones can be pricey. That in mind, I am very happy with this product and the performance. I was able to get a non-standard controller without shelling out the money for a fully custom one and this controller has held up against several months of pretty heavy play. If you are looking for solid design and quality, consider putting that extra $10 here.
customer_reviews.author: Byron C

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS CONTROLLER - GO TO A STORE AND PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: Within owning this product for two months, the joy stick started to drift, the sync button is permanently depressed so it's forever stuck to my xbox, and the mic port seems to be broken. One of the worst purchases I have made. I called in and was going to get a refund but I forgot about it and now I'm stuck with a BAD controller. Just wish Microsoft could make a product that is built extremely cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Liam

customer_reviews.title: Dependable & Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: It's brand new so everything is great on this controller. Not disappointed in purchasing it. These Xbox One controllers last pretty much a long time. Last one (which is the one we just replace) we purchase back in 2013 of February. It's probably also depends on how you take care of it, which my husband is really great at it. 👍😊
customer_reviews.author: Prys Nez

customer_reviews.title: Xbox= Crap Controllers
customer_reviews.text: Microsoft doesn't make very good controllers unless you cam afford to drop $149.99 on a "Pro" controller.....but it worked fine for about 6 months then the analog broke...this was my 10th Xbox controller but ive never had to buy a new PS4 controller....come to think of it I've never had to replace my Switch controllers either.....
customer_reviews.author: HRH114

customer_reviews.title: Good controller.
customer_reviews.text: Not much use out of it but the left analog sticks downward moving the cursor towards the bottom of the screen in games.
customer_reviews.author: Josh White

customer_reviews.title: Great controller!
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves this controller! Does use a lot of battery so either have a rechargeable replacement battery ready or a ton of batteries
customer_reviews.author: A Couple of Nerds

customer_reviews.title: Controller Strafes left on its own
customer_reviews.text: I owned this for two months approximately and every once in a while it just strafes left. For the cost of the controller you would think that they would last longer. I will not bed purchasing one of these controllers again. Just a waste of money at this point
customer_reviews.author: Gos

customer_reviews.title: Caution
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son. Received it on July 2, 2018. (Todays date 8/29/18) The part where you plug in the mic stopped working. He didn't get to use it a full two months and it messed up. $54.45 for a control, you would think it would last more than two months. 🤬
customer_reviews.author: criston

customer_reviews.title: Improvements!
customer_reviews.text: Nice controller. This one replaced an original that I got with my Xbox ONE, and there have definitely been improvements to the design in the interim. Rubberized/textured grips and a good feel in the buttons. Very pleased, and looking to replace another older controller with a sticky Y button in the future.
customer_reviews.author: LearningMonkey

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality control. Broke in 5 minutes
customer_reviews.text: I’m really disappointed. I purchased this controller at full price last year for Christmas for my son as a backup controller. He kept it in the box unopened for over a year, opens it up, uses it once and the left joystick snaps in 5 minutes. I really don’t feel this is acceptable under any circumstance.
customer_reviews.author: herbie

customer_reviews.title: It’s a good controller
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had the controller for a little over 6 months and it’s been reliable and worked well for me. I’m not one that button smashes or eats greasy foods while playing video games, so I can’t say to that effect how durable it is, but if you’re the average user, this will work just fine for you. Looks really slick too. PS: I don’t know if this is a feature of every Xbox controller, but it comes with software updates every once in awhile so if you ever have a hard time connecting to your headset, go check that out in the controller settings. I was super surprised to find that’s why I wasn’t connecting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: We bought this from Amazon Warehouse and it started off great. But it kept having interference issues if used wirelessly. Then he started using it wired and it just didn’t last as long as it should have. Maybe because we bought it already used??
customer_reviews.author: kyyadifan

customer_reviews.title: Joy stick, not a Joy.
customer_reviews.text: Had high Hope's, but the left joystick began to wander to the right when pushing lightly and releasing. It would not return to center. I noticed it after about 3 hours of play.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Villa

customer_reviews.title: Two Units Quit Working After a Few Months - Same Problem
customer_reviews.text: This is our second unit and both failed after a few months. Both no longer would work with headsets. As soon as we tried another controller, the headset worked so we are quite sure that these controllers simply don't last. What a waste of money!!
customer_reviews.author: david d

customer_reviews.title: Good controller but very loud vibration
customer_reviews.text: Got this controller as a gift for a friend. He says its a great controller, it's good quality and he likes the colors. The only issue is that when he's in a party on Xbox and he has the vibration on it's REALLY loud and everyone can hear it. Not sure if it's just his controller that has the issue or if it would be the same for all of the controllers of this model.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Thoman

customer_reviews.title: Great Controller
customer_reviews.text: The original remote controls that came with our Xbox were kind of crappy. They each got various problems not very long after we purchased the Xbox. This remote we've had for a while, with no problems, and it is definitely superior quality than the ones that come with the Xbox. Everybody fights over this one!
customer_reviews.author: E.C.

customer_reviews.title: Lasted three months, never really worked right
customer_reviews.text: This controller never seemed to work right wirelessly, so I would keep it plugged into the Xbox when using it but now it doesn't work that way either. I've had it for less than three full months and it is used in a household without any children and very light use. I have done all sorts of troubleshooting swapping around batteries and cords and it is 100% a faulty controller. Can't seem to figure out how to get any support through Microsoft right now either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disconnect but other then that great
customer_reviews.text: Would give it a 4.5 review because it worked perfectly until I moved out of the room with the controller. Ever since then it would connect then disconnect from the xbox but I just plug it in to the xbox also there is a slight gap with the front and back of the case but nothing big yet
customer_reviews.author: Christina L. Schatz

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Controller so far
customer_reviews.text: Feels very good so far. So far the response is as you would expect for a Microsoft controller. Short of buying a $200 controller...you can't beat the quality and performance of this controller! So far I actually like it better than the original one shipped with my Xbox X.
customer_reviews.author: Mike L

customer_reviews.title: brilliant! definitely amazon warehouse have great deals
customer_reviews.text: brilliant! definitely amazon warehouse have great deals , product came as described and without any issues when configuring to my pc or xbox. very fast delivery as always.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Chinchilla

customer_reviews.title: Sent deffective or broken.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it in September, I just opened the package. I had other controllers so I put it up and away in my closet. Pulled it out to use for the first time and it's wireless and blutooth features don't work, tried updating controller via hardwire still nada. Tried all sorts of trouble shooting and nothing worked, the conteoller is broken. Also box was damaged when recieved, made the mistake of not pulling it out immediately.
customer_reviews.author: brandon steadman

customer_reviews.title: Works great looks great
customer_reviews.text: Was in great condition and works fine. Have to buy another since hubby is jealous, it’s his favorite colors
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Dean

customer_reviews.title: looks gooooooddd
customer_reviews.text: works great feels good. use it with my computer when i just wanna play a racing game without mouse and keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy.
customer_reviews.text: The controller was brand new. Works perfectly and I like the way it looks and feels. No complaints. I may do an update review in case it doesn't last but im not worried about it.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Lopez

customer_reviews.title: A nice controller
customer_reviews.text: A pretty nice looking controller and still working tell now after 3 months of 8 hours of gaming daily
customer_reviews.author: Elias

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE OF USED CONTROLLER
customer_reviews.text: I bought what I thought was a used grey/green controller. Now, I usually lower my expectations on used products because cosmetically, they may not look great, but functionally they should be sound. However when I got the controller, not only did I get the wrong color (an issue some have had with this product), but it was damaged. I got a white controller with a deep gash in the d pad. I'll be returning this item, but I won't buy another just because of the hassle. So, be careful when getting used controllers because even though Amazon says they inspect them, they clearly don't do a good job.
customer_reviews.author: Yuri Reed

customer_reviews.title: Also has bluetooth for mobile games!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my nephews birthday, and he loved the fact that it had bluetooth as well. He hooked it up to his phine to play mobile games.
customer_reviews.author: trinity hoeltke

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great, I missed the feeling of a new controller. UPDATE: The joystick started to mess up, like every controller. Don't drop it!
customer_reviews.author: gadi

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't seem like a factory sealed new controller.
customer_reviews.text: The xbox packaging was dirty and covered in dark grimy fingerprints. Opened the box and noticed immediately that the controller had a noticeable right drift on the left analog stick. This absolutely was not a factory sealed controller. Waiting on replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Jones

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy refurbed.
customer_reviews.text: Joystick stuck in the down position and I waited too long to test it so the return window has closed. Sucks because I really like using controllers on my PC games and thought this would be perfect. My Windows 10 computer could not detect the controller via bluetooth, so I purchased a cable. Now it's detected but useless.
customer_reviews.author: Nogahr

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t own an Xbone but this is the perfect controller for PC gaming. The ergonomic feel in your hands is perfect and love the color scheme. Pairing to my PC’s built in Bluetooth took little to no effort.
customer_reviews.author: moiven

customer_reviews.title: THE COLOR !!
customer_reviews.text: great color wave, xbox has some of the best color waves, and great ergomic controller design.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy Camilo

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable and well-built
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable to use and very very well-built. Paired easily to the Amazon FireTV (Firestick 4K) and is equally responsive via Bluetooth. Awesome purchase.
customer_reviews.author: wozzle

customer_reviews.title: Yep. It controls the xbox
customer_reviews.text: It controls my mind and if I don’t do what it tells me the bees that live in my head will sting me.
customer_reviews.author: ffej

customer_reviews.title: Loses Connectivity if Further Than Few Feet Away
customer_reviews.text: Other reviews were right on this one. This specific controller will lose connection to the Xbox once you get more than a few feet away on a consistent basis. They must have used cheap or faulty transmitters of some sort. I've gone through many Xbox controllers both before and after this one with no issue. Colors are cool but not worth wasting your money - just get a white or black one from Amazon - they actually work!
customer_reviews.author: N. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: My son loved it so much he stopped using the white remote because the remote works with both headsets.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Alcala

product_meta.title: Xbox Wireless Controller - Grey/Green
product_meta.description:
Edition:Grey/Green| Configuration:Single

Experience the enhanced comfort and feel of the Xbox wireless controller, featuring a light grey design with green accents, and textured grip. Enjoy custom button mapping and up to twice the wireless range. Plug in any compatible headset with the 3.5mm stereo headset jack. And with Bluetooth technology, play your favorite games on Windows 10 PCs and tablets.

Compatible with: Xbox One X, Xbox One S, Xbox One, Windows 10
feature_bullets: Experience the enhanced comfort and feel of the Xbox wireless controller
Features a light grey design with green accents
Play your favorite games on Windows 10 PCs and tablets; Plus upto twice the wireless range (tested using the Xbox One S Console)
Stay on target with textured grip; Compatible With: Xbox One X, Xbox One S, Xbox One, Windows 10. Includes Bluetooth technology for gaming on Windows 10 PCs and tablets
Compatible with Xbox Series X, Xbox One, Windows 10

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars5,729 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
specifications.Pricing: The strikethrough price is the List Price. Savings represents a discount off the List Price.
